title: Wink Bright Smart Home Lighting Starter Kit with Wink Hub 2, SYLVANIA SMART+ bulbs, Compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant
feature: Compatible with all major smart home categories. Requirements : Apple smartphones and tablets (tablets use iPhone app) or Android device
SMART HOME LIGHTING: Has everything to start smart home. Easily install the SYLVANIA SMART+ bulbs and harness the power of light
EXPAND YOUR SMART HOME: Easily manage and expand your smart home ecosystem with the included Wink Hub 2
ULTIMATE COMPATIBILITY: Wink Hub 2 enables to connect and control 400+ smart home devices, including Nest, Philips, Ring, Ecobee, GoControl, Schlage, Sonos, Arlo, Yale and Chamberlain
THE LARGEST PROTOCOL SUPPORT: Wink Hub supports Bluetooth LE, ZigBee, Z-Wave, Kidde, and Lutron Clear Connect. Works with more smart home protocols
IN THE BOX: Wink Hub 2, Two SYLVANIA SMART+ A19 Dimmable Bulbs (60W Equivalent with a 10-year Life Expectancy), Power Adapter, Ethernet Cable, and in-app Home Sitter and Moonlight services
When you control your lights using the Wink app, your smartphone sends a signal over the internet to your hub to turn your lights on or off
Compatible with all major smart home categories
description: It’s easy to make your home smart and secure with wink bright. A little light goes a long way. Wink bright empowers you to control your home’s lights from anywhere, because a well-lit home is a safe home. Our smart lighting essentials include a wink hub 2, two Sylvania smart a19 dimmable bulbs, and two built-in app services: home sitter, which makes your home look lived in while you're away, and moonlight, which turns your lights on at sunset and off at sunrise.
